mapper.sql: ID_RECORDING, ID_SUB_AUDIO, ID_WXUSER, R_SEQ_NO, R_RECORD_TIME, R_FILE_PATH, R_FILE_SIZE, R_CLIENTIP, R_CLIENTAPP, CREATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSER, IS_ACTIVE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_recording
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_recording (ID_RECORDING, ID_SUB_AUDIO, ID_WXUSER, R_SEQ_NO, R_RECORD_TIME, R_FILE_PATH, R_FILE_SIZE, R_CLIENTIP, R_CLIENTAPP, CREATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSER, IS_ACTIVE) values (#{idRecording,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idSubAudio,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idWxuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rFileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rClientip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rClientapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update t_recording
ID_RECORDING = #{record.idRecording,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ID_SUB_AUDIO = #{record.idSubAudio,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ID_WXUSER = #{record.idWxuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_recording set ID_RECORDING = #{record.idRecording,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ID_SUB_AUDIO = #{record.idSubAudio,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ID_WXUSER = #{record.idWxuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_SEQ_NO = #{record.rSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_RECORD_TIME = #{record.rRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, R_FILE_PATH = #{record.rFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_FILE_SIZE = #{record.rFileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_CLIENTIP = #{record.rClientip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_CLIENTAPP = #{record.rClientapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEUSER = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEUSER = #{record.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ACTIVE = #{record.isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_recording
ID_SUB_AUDIO = #{idSubAudio,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ID_WXUSER = #{idWxuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
R_SEQ_NO = #{rSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
R_RECORD_TIME = #{rRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
R_FILE_PATH = #{rFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
R_FILE_SIZE = #{rFileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
R_CLIENTIP = #{rClientip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
R_CLIENTAPP = #{rClientapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID_RECORDING = #{idRecording,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_recording set ID_SUB_AUDIO = #{idSubAudio,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ID_WXUSER = #{idWxuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_SEQ_NO = #{rSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_RECORD_TIME = #{rRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, R_FILE_PATH = #{rFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_FILE_SIZE = #{rFileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_CLIENTIP = #{rClientip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_CLIENTAPP = #{rClientapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID_RECORDING = #{idRecording,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_recording set IS_ACTIVE = 0, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where R_SEQ_NO = #{rSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ID_WXUSER in (select ID_WXUSER from t_wxuser where U_OPENID = #{uOpenid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND IS_ACTIVE = 1) and IS_ACTIVE = 1
